Name: US President
Description: A type for people who have held the office of President of the United States of America. Includes a property for vice president and one for the number of their presidency (1, 16, 42, etc..

Properties.Name: President number
Properties.Description: The number of this person's presidency; presidents with non-sequential terms have two numbers.

Properties.Name: Vice president
Properties.Description: People who have served as vice president under this president.
